content.rendered:
What is Bitcoin Gold?

Bitcoin Gold is a cryptocurrency and one of the latest hard forks of Bitcoin. The main idea behind the project is to make Bitcoin more decentralized. To do so the team created new mining protocol (Equiqash). Read more

Bitcoin Gold Wallet

Manage your crypto wisely! Learn how to setup Atomic Wallet to send, receive, exchange and buy cryptocurrency
